name: Saheeh International
text: Ta, Ha.

name: Saheeh International
text: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed

name: Saheeh International
text: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -

name: Saheeh International
text: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,

name: Saheeh International
text: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established.

name: Saheeh International
text: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.

name: Saheeh International
text: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.

name: Saheeh International
text: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.

name: Saheeh International
text: And has the story of Moses reached you? -

name: Saheeh International
text: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."

name: Saheeh International
text: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.

name: Saheeh International
text: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.

name: Saheeh International
text: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.

name: Saheeh International
text: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."

name: Saheeh International
text: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.

name: Saheeh International
text: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,

name: Saheeh International
text: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.

name: Saheeh International
text: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]

name: Saheeh International
text: And ease for me my task

name: Saheeh International
text: And untie the knot from my tongue

name: Saheeh International
text: That they may understand my speech.

name: Saheeh International
text: And appoint for me a minister from my family -

name: Saheeh International
text: Aaron, my brother.

name: Saheeh International
text: Increase through him my strength

name: Saheeh International
text: And let him share my task

name: Saheeh International
text: That we may exalt You much

name: Saheeh International
text: And remember You much.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,

name: Saheeh International
text: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,

name: Saheeh International
text: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.

name: Saheeh International
text: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.

name: Saheeh International
text: And I produced you for Myself.

name: Saheeh International
text: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.

name: Saheeh International
text: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

name: Saheeh International
text: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.

name: Saheeh International
text: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "

name: Saheeh International
text: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."

name: Saheeh International
text: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.

name: Saheeh International
text: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.

name: Saheeh International
text: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?

name: Saheeh International
text: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."

name: Saheeh International
text: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].

name: Saheeh International
text: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."

name: Saheeh International
text: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.

name: Saheeh International
text: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].

name: Saheeh International
text: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.

name: Saheeh International
text: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.

name: Saheeh International
text: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."

name: Saheeh International
text: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.

name: Saheeh International
text: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:

name: Saheeh International
text: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."

name: Saheeh International
text: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,

name: Saheeh International
text: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].

name: Saheeh International
text: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,

name: Saheeh International
text: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."

name: Saheeh International
text: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."

name: Saheeh International
text: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."

name: Saheeh International
text: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."

name: Saheeh International
text: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?

name: Saheeh International
text: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,

name: Saheeh International
text: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"

name: Saheeh International
text: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.

name: Saheeh International
text: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."

name: Saheeh International
text: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.

name: Saheeh International
text: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,

name: Saheeh International
text: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -

name: Saheeh International
text: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.

name: Saheeh International
text: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."

name: Saheeh International
text: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."

name: Saheeh International
text: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.

name: Saheeh International
text: And He will leave the earth a level plain;

name: Saheeh International
text: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."

name: Saheeh International
text: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].

name: Saheeh International
text: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.

name: Saheeh International
text: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.

name: Saheeh International
text: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.

name: Saheeh International
text: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.

name: Saheeh International
text: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.

name: Saheeh International
text: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."

name: Saheeh International
text: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.

name: Saheeh International
text: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.

name: Saheeh International
text: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."

name: Saheeh International
text: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"

name: Saheeh International
text: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].

name: Saheeh International
text: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."

name: Saheeh International
text: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."

name: Saheeh International
text: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.

name: Saheeh International
text: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].

name: Saheeh International
text: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.

name: Saheeh International
text: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.

name: Saheeh International
text: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?

name: Saheeh International
text: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
